arts.ttl: Jens Stage steals the show as Werder Bremen edge past Bochum
arts.sum: Werder Bremen secured a crucial 1-0 away win against Bochum, with Jens Stage's 56th-minute header proving the difference in a tightly contested Bundesliga clash. The match promised to be a tense affair, with Bremen's away form pitted against Bochum's determination to secure their first win of the season.

arts.ttl: Reliable sources: Werder work out loan deal for Keïta
arts.sum: Germany's top two sporting publications are currently reporting that SV Werder Bremen have ironed out a loan arrangement for Guinean international Naby Keïta.

arts.ttl: Bochum vs. Bremen preview: Hosts still seeking first win of the season
arts.sum: As both a player and a coach, VfL Bochum trainer Dieter Hecking has enjoyed great success against Werder Bremen. Hecking's current team - historically woeful against the Hanseaten - will be hoping that their new gaffer has some novel answers on Saturday.
